title: Error code: 1B
body: Can't play any games as Riot server seems to be down, any eta on when it will be back up? Multiple friends are affected with this. Thanks!

replies.body: how hard is it for them to not {{summoner:4}}uck their game up all the time?

How many bugs are there going to be in this patch?
 - Transfers not working
 - Match history consistently breaking
 - Lobbies not working properly for duo+ unless you do some weird ass work-around
 - Now lobbies not even working at all?
What's next
is there an eta until when this is going to be fixed?
Yea, same here. Tried relog several times and initiate full repair function as well... I guess it is a server issue
yeah a few of my friends and I are experiencing the same issue. But then 3 of my other friends managed to click on the play button, and are in game now.
Yeah I guess they will experience it when they log out or finish their games. Looks like a server issue :(
This Patch has had way to many bugs in it !! Cant even play a simple game...….
I just got in. Kept restarting the client and eventually the button was clickable
There are no other ways to queue other than clicking play game?

Been waiting for boritos to fix the client
Rito plz, fire your client coders and hire your music team to do the server maintance job, wouldve been better
Has anyone tried to reinstall the game?
Not at this point no :( I have nbn which will take 5 mins to do but I can't be bothered haha
lol fair enough. Just saw the announcement from the little "!"  next to "Play" button, seems like Riot is working on it.

the announcement says it's a display issue with the play button, if you click quickly after login you can bring up lobby selector.

Does you no good though, it then has red exclamations next to all the modes and won't let you in, and custom games also don't work.
yeah the ones that were already in lobby aren't affected. they will still get to play again. that same guy that was in game had a remake. and hes in champ select now again.
Yep correct :( if they log out they will be affected
Currently Experiencing the same problem. shows error 1B. But anyone who was in a Lobby before it started happening seem unaffected.
People that have finished their games are not affected, unless they log out then they are in the same boat as us.

Riot's now employing amateurs !!!???

I hear they don't look after their own staff anymore.
